ingMand: 12 g baking powder (or 70 g sourdough starter)

insSteps: To a bowl, add all ingredients (except for the apples), and mix until homogenous. (Do not overmix).
Add sliced apples and gently fold into batter.
Transfer batter to a prepared cake pan (lined with parchment paper). Spread batter evenly.
Bake in preheated oven at 180 °C for 55 minutes (or until a toothpick inserted in the middle of cake comes out clean).
